description: Colgate Total Antibacterial Charcoal Deep Clean Toothpaste active cleaning formula fights plaque between teeth and hard to reach places, and provides a superior clean with stronger 12 hour bacterial defense***Colgate Total® Antibacterial Fluoride toothpaste has a unique formula that keeps your whole mouth healthy by fighting bacteria on teeth, tongue, cheeks, and gums for 12 hours*. Colgate Total Charcoal Deep Clean, active cleaning formula fights plaque even between teeth and hard to reach spaces**.A Healthier YouEvery day, we make it our mission to get you feeling your best - and we believe a healthy mouth makes a difference in being ready for what's ahead.So we are truly excited that you've chosen us to help you step forward confidently into life, with a smile that's healthy as can be.Colgate Total Whole Mouth Health Toothpaste helps to:• Prevents cavities• Remove plaque• Protect enamel• Prevent tartar buildup• Freshen breath• Whiten teeth• Protect gumsNo Colgate Toothpaste contains Sugar. Colgate Total toothpaste are also Vegan, Gluten Free and Responsibly Made^Recommended by: The Australian Dental Association (ADA) & New Zealand Dental Association (NZDA).Boxed contents: 1 ToothpasteSize: 200g*With 4 weeks of continuous use**vs. a regular fluoride toothpaste***vs. ordinary non-antibacterial fluoride toothpastes, with 4 weeks of continued use^To learn more, visit colgatepalmolive.com/responsibly-madeWHOLE MOUTH HEALTH: Brushing with Colgate Total Toothpaste will help improve your teeth, tongue, cheeks and gum health.STRONGER 12-HOUR BACTERIAL DEFENSE: Use Colgate Total Antibacterial Toothpaste for a stronger 12 hour bacterial defense***CHARCOAL DEEP CLEAN: active cleaning formula fights plaque between teeth and hard to reach spacesCAVITY PROTECTION: Formula helps to remove plaque with brushing and prevents buildup of cavities and tartarADDITIONAL BENEFITS: Freshens breath, protects gums and enamel
name: Colgate Total Charcoal Deep Clean Antibacterial Toothpaste 200g
